title: Ouija Boards - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/7/22
itunes:title: Ouija Boards - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/7/22
description:
George Noory and historian Robert Murch explore his research into ouija boards, what forces may be moving the planchette to receive messages from the spirit world, and some of the dangers of attempting to contact the dead.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
